mapper.insert: insert into `tbl_transaction` (id, owner, amountOfMoney, name, expectedClosingDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, description, createBy, createTime, contactSummary, nextContactTime) value (#{id}, #{owner}, #{amountOfMoney}, #{name}, #{expectedClosingDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{description}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{contactSummary, nextContactTime})
